org.arkanos.pivotal_analytics.managers

Class CookieManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.arkanos.pivotal_analytics.managers.CookieManager

  • public class CookieManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The CookieManager class takes care of HTTP Cookie manipulation. This class is entirely based on static behavior!
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matheus Borges Teixeira

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int cookieMaxAge
      Sets Cookie lifetime to two weeks

      CookieManager()

    • Method Detail

      • createCookies

        public static java.util.Vector<javax.servlet.http.Cookie> createCookies(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> contents)
        Creates a simple Vector with all desired Cookies from a String-to-String Map.
        Parameters:
        contents - specifies the cookies to be created.
        Returns:
        all desired configured Cookies to be saved.

      • countCookies

        public static boolean countCookies(javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] cookies)
        Counts and verifies that all required Cookies are in place.
        Parameters:
        cookies - informs which cookies have been provided.
        Returns:
        true if all required cookies are in place, false otherwise.

      • matchCookie

        public static javax.servlet.http.Cookie matchCookie(javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] set,
                                    java.lang.String name)
        Searches for a particular Cookie in a given set.
        Parameters:
        set - defines an array with all cookies.
        name - specifies the name of the cookie to be found.
        Returns:
        null if the Cookie is not found, or the first match otherwise.

      • extractLabels

        public static java.util.Vector<java.lang.String> extractLabels(javax.servlet.http.Cookie[] set)
        Breaks one special Cookie into an array of Strings. This Cookie must contain the labels separated by comma. Usage of spaces should be avoided.
        Parameters:
        set - specifies all given Cookies.
        Returns:
        an array with all broken labels as individual Strings.
